alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Philadelphia (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 3:48PM EST until January 13 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM FRIDAY TO 5 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, northern and southern Delaware, northeast Maryland, central and southern New Jersey and southeast Pennsylvania. * WHEN...From 8 PM Friday to 5 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southeast winds will increase late Friday into Friday evening. Extremely saturated soils due to previous rainfall events may result in trees and power poles being more more susceptible to wind.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
